name: Embiblio
short_description:
Links connect data points, but until read by a mind they are not information.

Chords provide an easy way to connect several links, or Ringtail's, in subjective relationships that make them more informative.  Embiblio servers store and distribute Chords.  Neurok takes Chords and turns them into neural networks, who reference an Embiblio database.

People might like to use Chords to communicate concepts more effectively to other people.  With a GenieBulb's (a mapping to WebServices), Chords can also be used to automate GUI routines that users find themselves doing frequently.  Machines might also appreciate the abstraction level provided in Embiblio Chords, as in it's provision-- a metaphor to neurology.

If you would like to help out in anyway feel free to drop a line.  You can find some of the brainstorming done so far here:  https://github.com/embiblio
summary: Aster Constellations Mean That Thing Where
